com.github.rvesse.airline.help.ronn

Class RonnCommandUsageGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rvesse.airline.help.common.AbstractUsageGenerator
      • com.github.rvesse.airline.help.common.AbstractCommandUsageGenerator
        • com.github.rvesse.airline.help.ronn.RonnCommandUsageGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandUsageGenerator
    Deprecated. 
    The RONN format has some know bugs and it is recommended to use classes from the airline-help-man or airline-help-markdown modules instead of classes from this module

    public class RonnCommandUsageGenerator
extends AbstractCommandUsageGenerator
    A command usage generator which generates help in Ronn format which can then be transformed into man pages or HTML pages as desired using the Ronn tooling
    Author:
    rvesse

    • Constructor Detail

      • RonnCommandUsageGenerator

        public RonnCommandUsageGenerator()
        Deprecated. 

      • RonnCommandUsageGenerator

        public RonnCommandUsageGenerator(int manSection,
                         boolean includeHidden,
                         boolean standalone)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new RONN usage generator
        Parameters:
        manSection - Man section to which this command belongs, use constants from ManSections
        standalone - Whether this is a stand-alone RONN file, this controls the formatting of the title which is significant when using this in conjunction with things like the RonnGlobalUsageGenerator where the output from this is output a fragment of a larger document and RONN will not render the titles if stand-alone is enabled
